Field.tooltip: Controls the amount of debug information written to the log.
Field.Label: Debug level:

Turn on debugging only when needed. Be careful when posting the output to the forums or other public places as it could expose sensitive information. Unticking the checkbox will disable debug logging.
Low - Minimal debugging. Medium - All debug logging except sensitive information. High - May contain sensitive information.
